1.title: Welcome to Atlanta
1.plot: Pastor Canton Jones invites the hottest names of music and ministry in the ATL to a listening party for his new, gospel Hip Hop album while Pastor Le'Andria Johnson may have to deal with some family drama of her own.

2.title: Code Red
2.plot: Pastor Le'Andria Johnson's husband finally takes a paternity test to find out if the alleged mother of his child's claims are correct. Pastor and police officer Corey Hambrick hold a forum in an attempt to address race relations with cops.

3.title: Truth and Consequences
3.plot: Corey flips out when his 19-year-old stepdaughter admits to dating an older man. Le'Andria hit the streets dressed as a prostitute to minister to ladies of the night. Kim tries to get her son involved in the family ministry.

7.title: A Cross to Bear
7.plot: When the other pastors try to intervene, tensions bubble surrounding Le'Andria's erratic behavior and Judah's differing theology. Corey's daughter reveals a shocking development in her controversial relationship with her boyfriend

8.title: Hell and Back
8.plot: To ease the strains among the pastors, they take their ministry to the streets by throwing a block party. But, as gossip instead of gospel spreads, the pastors come to a crossroads in their relationships.

imdb.plot outline: This time in the popular "Preachers" franchise, the cameras are headed to Atlanta to follow some of the biggest preachers in the American South. Come church time, these mega-pastors become superstars of their communities. They may appear to have all of the answers, but away from the pulpit they struggle with ordinary challenges experienced by everyone. From dealing with family issues to maintaining friendships, these preachers know that living a fulfilling life requires hard work and a whole lot of faith.
imdb.title: Preachers of Atlanta
plot: Meet the superstars of the pulpit as they focus on the daily struggles and triumphs, while also maintaining their duties as men and women of God.

This time in the popular "Preachers" franchise, the cameras are headed to Atlanta to follow some of the biggest preachers in the American South. Come church time, these mega-pastors become superstars of their communities. They may appear to have all of the answers, but away from the pulpit they struggle with ordinary challenges experienced by everyone. From dealing with family issues to maintaining friendships, these preachers know that living a fulfilling life requires hard work and a whole lot of faith.
